HTML ## 4.1. doctype - - doctype - - ## 4.2. - HTML - ## 4.3. ### 4.3.1. flow - heading - sectioning - phrasing p h - Embedded audio canvas - interactive button a - metadata base link meta noscript script style title ### 4.3.2. ## 4.4. Web /Accessibility - Web - WCAG2.0 - ARIA - - img alt - noscript - input label - - - tab modal focus ## 4.6. - [W3C Validator html ](http://validator.w3.org/) - emmet - markdown ## 4.7. - [HTML: The Living Standard](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/dev/) - [Activating Browser Modes with Doctype](https://hsivonen.fi/doctype/) - [Accessibility](https://www.w3.org/standards/webdesign/accessibility) - Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 - [HTML5 Doctor: Semantics](http://html5doctor.com/element-index/) ## ### class id style ### title tooltip ### tabindex tab ### lang http://www.runoob.com/tags/html-language-codes.html ### dir rtl ltr auto ### accesskey 'h' OS chrome alt + 'h' ## HTML5 ### data-\* data- ``` el.getAttribute("data-xx") ``` ### hidden display:none ### contenteditable ### contextmenu firefox ```

``` ### draggable( HTML5drag ) ```javascript

function allowDrop(ev){ ev.preventDefault(); } function drag(ev){ ev.dataTransfer.setData("Text",ev.target.id); } function drop(ev){ var data=ev.dataTransfer.getData("Text"); ev.target.appendChild(document.getElementById(data)); ev.preventDefault(); } ``` ### dropzone : ### , ### sppelcheck ### translate =yes|no # datalist select input multiple button type video img p div figure dfn cite ---

Post._content:
# css cascading stylesheet # Level - CSS Level 1 - CSS Level 2 (CSS 2.2 ) - CSS Level 3 2.2 - Color Module Level 3 - Selectors Level 3 - Media Queries - Fonts Level 3 # ## - \* - E - .class - id #id ## [ ] ```css /* */ [disabled] /* */ [type="checkbox"] /* */ [href*="example"] /* */ [href^="http:"] /* */ [href$="jpg"] /* */ [lang~"zh-cn"]/* class */ ``` ## ```css /* */ a:link { ... } /* */ a:visited { ... } /* */ a:hover { ... } /* */ a:active { ... } /* */ a:focus { ... } /* */ input:disabled { ... } /* */ input:checked { ... } /* */ /*:checkedtoggle*/ /* */ :first-child :last-child :nth-child(2n+1) :first-of-type :last-of-type div:nth-of-type(2n+1) /*nth-child()*/ :empty ``` ## - E F - E>F - E~F - E+F # - ::before - ::after - ::first-letter - ::first-line # / Specificity - !important > > id > > - - # - - CSS - - [Mozilla Firefox ](https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/layout/style/res/html.css) - [Google Chrome ](https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/blink/+/master/Source/core/css/html.css) - > > - !important important > important > > > # Defaulting ## ## ```css html { box-sizing: border-box; } * { box-sizing: inherit; /* content-box */ } #xxx { box-sizing: content-box; } ``` ## initial - CSS - background-color transparent - margin-left 0font-size 16pxline-height 1.2 font-family - background-color: initial - mdn # CSS ## CSS ```html

Carlsbad Caverns 230

``` ## CSS - filtering media ** Declared Values** - cascading** Cascaded Value** - defaulting | ** Specified Value** - resolving em px% px** Computed Value** - formatting:** Used Value** - constraining**** # CSS ## ### content-box - margin - border - padding - contentwidth height ### border-box - margin - border width = border + padding + content_width - padding - content ## height 100% - - - vw vh 100vh 100% ## padding 100% - padding padding topleft**** - . ## margin margin ## border - border - width height 0 # background: repeating-conic-gradient(black 0 60deg, yellow 0 120deg); # ## Viewport viewport ## (Block-level Elements) - - pdivsection - display blocklist-itemtable ## (Inline-level Elements) - - - display inlineinline-blockinline-table ---

Post._content:
## 

#### 1. [Hexo](https://hexo.io) - 
- Node.js 
- Hexo  GitHub Flavored Markdown  Octopress 
- Hexo  Hexo  Jade, CoffeeScript


#### 2. [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/) - HTTPS
1. 
2. 
3. 

## 

1. `Markdown` markdown  md 
2. ` ` md githubNetlify
3. `  HTTPS`Netlify(scarsu.comdoc.scarsu.comNetlifyDNSgithubgitbook)
4. ``hexo/hexopuger

## 

- Hexo [Maupassant Theme](https://github.com/tufu9441/maupassant-hexo/)
-  [github scarsu/ScarSuHexo_Netlify](https://github.com/scarsu/ScarSuHexo_Netlify)


## 
```bash
#
git clone https://github.com/scarsu/ScarSuHexo_Netlify.git
#hexo
npm install hexo -g 
#
npm install 
#
hexo d -g 
#
hexo s 
```


## git
```bash
.
 _config.yml    #
 package.json    #npm
 scaffolds   #
 public   #.gitignore
 node_modules   #node.gitignore
 source      #
|    _posts     #markownmd
|    _xx      #_
|    xx      #  
 themes      #
     maupassant     #maupassant
             languages      #
             layout      #
             source      #
             _config.yml      #

```

Post.title: MongoDB
Post._content:
## 

    3.0.15
    [](https://www.mongodb.com/download-center?jmp=nav)

## 

    C:\Program Files\MongoDB\Server\3.0\bin(windows)
    
    mongo   
    mongod  
    mongoimport  

## 

    C:\data\db

##  cmd 

    mongod --dbpath c:\data\db
    cmdmongodb
    cmd
    --dbpath
    mongodb

## use

    use 
    
    useuse

## 

    db

## 

    
    (collections)
    db.userid.insert({"id":"zengsuyu","password":"123456789"});
    userid

## 

    db.dropDatabase();

##  json 

    sublimejson
    -db 
    --collection  
    --drop 
    --file jsonjson

## :

    db..find() 
    db..find({"key":"value"})  (keyvalue
    db..find().sort("")  

## mongoose

    

-    Mongo 

```
var mongoose = require('mongoose');
var db = mongoose.connect('mongodb://localhost/geekChat');//
```

-    open 

```
db.once('open', function (callback) {
    console.log("");
});
```

-   

```
//
var Cat = mongoose.model('Cat', { name: String });
//
var kitty = new Cat({ name: 'Zildjian' });
//save
kitty.save(function (err) {
  console.log('');
});
```

-   

```
var Schema = mongoose.Schema;
var userScheMa = new Schema({
    name: String,
    password: String
}); //  users
exports.user = db.model('user', userScheMa); //  users

ref 
```

---

Post.title: Node nvm for windows
Post._content:
# nvm

 linux  cent os

# nvm for windows

[https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows/releases](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows/releases)

# 

    0. node
    1. nvmnvm use 
    2. nodenode

# 

```
nvm list -node
nvm list available -
nvm install xx.xx.xx -node
nvm use xx.xx.xx -node
nvm uninstall xx.xx.xx -node
```

# 

```
nvm arch -
nvm on/off -/nvm
nvm proxy [url] -
nvm root [path] -nvm
nvm node_mirror [url] -node
nvm npm_mirror [url] -npm
```

---

    node
